website_summaries.verdict: Great for modern and futuristic settings. Goes well over common spaces like kitchens and dining room tables to provide a good combination of light and visual appeal.
pros: Each individual droplet is tightly secured to the main upper base so you don't have to worry about objects falling overhead
cons: Crystal droplets will sway if next to a fan or vent

customer_reviews.title: ... Lighting Flushmount Fixture Pendant Lamp 4 LED Bulbs Included Beautiful, Modern and yet sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: Saint Mossi® Modern Contemporary Crystal Ceiling Light Rain Drop LED Chandelier Lighting Flushmount Fixture Pendant Lamp 4 LED Bulbs Included Beautiful, Modern and yet sophisticated! I have ordered for my studio and it is my center point. Packaging came very secure in double box with properly wrapped. Installation was easy and fast. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indescribably Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Package came on time, well-wrapped and packed with all parts included, labeled and easy to find. I had an electrician come put this up for me so total time from opening package to final pics was about 30 minutes. This light is unbelievably gorgeous and the light refractions on the ceiling from the crystals are just amazing. It is a bit higher than I thought it would be but that's okay since it works perfectly for my small dining space. Such an amazing find on Amazon!! I did purchase the lights recommended from the same company and very pleased with those too. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: OverTheMoon

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty amazing. Took a while to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty amazing. Took a while to put together. I wish the small crystals were centered on the strand but the hole for the wire is off-center and the crystals are randomly shifted which kind of messes up the whole arrangement. But it's not too bad. Also, one of the bulb sockets is defected. I thought I had a bad bulb. It turns out that I need to "untwist" a bulb a little bit to make contact within socket. Provided that LED bulbs last for years, It doesn't bother me too much. Other than that I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was better than I expected!!! It is actually big and it looks beautiful!! Speed of shipping was great got here before I expected and the assemble was not confusing or difficult at all my 14 yr old did it herself how bout that🤯 I am so happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennisse Febles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: You need to put your mind into the lamp and don’t get afraid cause it requires lot of effort and time but if you looking for something beautiful and not that expensive then here you can find it with this beauty. Dry good customer service and very professional people thank you again
customer_reviews.author: @ebob

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: It took 4 hours for 2 of us to assemble and install but so worth the effort! It is a piece of art. It puts a beautiful glow on our dining room table and emits a prism of lights in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Breakspar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but time consuming to put up
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 1-2 hours to out this thing up. Installing to the ceiling electrically is no problem, but you have to hang every one of the crystals and that will take at least an hour. Overall, it is an impressive piece and was worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth it but assembling takes a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful crystal chandelier. The steps to put this together are simple but very laborious. I started thinking it would take me an hour or so to get this done but it took me 3 hours. The included dry wall are of poor quality and the anchors broke so I had to use different anchors. The crystals are really nice. I think it was worth the effort and the price. I’d definitely consider buying more from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: A great lamp.... With a modern POP!
customer_reviews.text: The crystal looks great on this piece. The finish is just like mirror and plenty of light. Install is straight forward and hardware is provided. What would make this and almost all new fixtures a 5 in my book is better hanging hardware, like self tapping multi material screws. I ended up using them because let's face it they are a lot simpler. The mirror finish will pick up every finger print so definitely use gloves. The biggest issue was installing the bulbs. DO IT before hanging crystal strands not after as they instruct. Over all a nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: E.D.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful entryway chandelier
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a partial home remodel and love it. This is a beautiful, high quality product for a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Jain

customer_reviews.title: Installation is easy
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in a compact box but the contents are very adequately protected. Installation is straightforward and took me about an hour or so. I particularly like the jewelry hooks as they make hanging the glass globes so much easier. Chandeliers I have done in the past all use split rings instead of hooks, and split rings are difficult to connect to the eyelets. I would say installation time has easily been cut by half with these wonderful hooks. My family and I are all very happy with this chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: pacific salmon

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chandelier. So elegant and very pretty , even my boys are very excited about it. The only bad thing is that it doesn't come with the light bulbs , each set of bulbs are $15 and you need two . But it's really pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jovalle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good easy to install Light bulbs are local available Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: zusah

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing in our master closet
customer_reviews.text: Installed in our master walk-in closet. Installed 4x 5000K (cool light) LED bulbs for daylight light and we can see the true colors of or clothes now! 2700K (warm light) is not made for closets, kitchens, or bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gill

customer_reviews.title: As perfect as the picture
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as it appears. Lovely! The installation was simple. The directions were clear and straightforward. The only thing I would say is that the lights that were suggested are just not bright enough for my taste. I will seek something a little brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jozie

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly beautiful at any price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more stars. No matter how I take the picture you can't tell how pretty it is in a photo. 1st it's packed and boxed perfect, no damage Easy directions, simple to put together. Lots of these types of chandeliers, have a very hard to put on clasp to hang the crystals form, this one is stupid simple. It looks like a $500 or more light.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou.

customer_reviews.title: Modern work of art at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We installed our Crystal Raindrop Chandelier yesterday and I can't express how happy I am! It is exquisite, contemporary and so beautiful to look at that you won't want to take your eyes off of it! The crystals are real and reflect the light in a variety of ways. It does take two people using white gloves to install it but the directions are very easy to follow. Truly work of art, it will transform any room and make you feel that you are in a Beverly Hills art gallery!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really elegant and bright.
customer_reviews.text: It is bright when turned on, also during the day the crystals shine prisms all over the walls which gives the room a beautiful spa-like effect. Only down fall was installing it - it took forever to get the foil off the chrome and attach the little crystals to the mounted piece.
customer_reviews.author: cclue

customer_reviews.title: Was a little tedious to install
customer_reviews.text: Very eye-catching piece in my art studio. Was a little tedious to install, as each crystal string had to be separately installed, along with the large crystal ball at the bottom. But it is absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Kavaloski

customer_reviews.title: Spotlight
customer_reviews.text: If you want a beautiful spotlight, this is it. It does not illuminate anything outside what is directly underneath it. Not meant for the kitchen or dining room, or really anywhere you need light.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous!!! We love the new chandelier. It is a two people job. Took about two hours. We just love the way the light looks. Would highly recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: ALI ASGHAR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This look elegant. Everything came with nice packaging. It took around 45min for me and my husband to assemble everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Best quality ever
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my Chandler it was well worth the purchase and the product is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanyhull110@gmail

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this light and have received so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this light and have received so many compliments. Was a little challenging for us to install, but my husband and I got it up and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and looks stunning when up. Best to have two people to install as there are 40 crystal balls to hang! Great value for money and came well protected in package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easy to install but does take some time.
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly confident in myself on putting things together and it took me over 2 hours to install it and put it together. Looks nice though. My wife and kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bablock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Easy to assemble. Very pretty in the room and with the movement of the crystals it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Stunning.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture. Easy to install, but time consuming. Only reason for 4 stars is because of a residue left by the plastic sheet protecting part of the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, but not crazy about the shadow that it creates directly on top of my white leather couch. It doesn’t bring the bulbs either, didn’t catch that when I placed the order.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaG

customer_reviews.title: Not protected by film
customer_reviews.text: My review is based solely on the fact that the fixture did not have protective film, therefor a few dents and minor scratches were noticed. Still installed it since my wife was waiting for this lamp for a few days now.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Honoret

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and completely changed the look of my living room. The hardest part is lining up the holes, once you do that installation is a breeze. I would definitely recommend this if someone wants to improve the look of any room.
customer_reviews.author: Keruvi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but tedious work
customer_reviews.text: Love how secured the packaging was. I installed this light with the help of my 12 year old son. It took us about 3 hours from the time I started taking down my old light until finishing installing the new one. I did a few reviews before installing and decided to go with better mounting screws. While the installation process was crucial and tedious, the outcome is amazing. I’ve wanted this light since we bought this house a year ago. Couldn’t be any more pleased (now that it’s up lol)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look like a expensive one
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to install those crystal but it worth it. The light is bright and elegant . I used it on my dinning room and love if
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to attach al of the crystals and so well ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely STUNNING! It was so easy to attach al of the crystals and so well packaged. This chandelier looks much more expensive than it was. Tysm!!
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover in AL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love everything about this light!
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazingly beautiful. Took about 40 minutes to hang. Half putting up the base and hooking up power, second half hanging the crystal balls. It came packaged very carefully with easy to understand instructions. I'm thinking about where I can hang another in my house! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pansa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier. It looks so pretty up and even my kids are impressed by it. It was not as hard to put together as I thought. Only negative was a light socket did not work and I already had up half the crystals but my husband was able to fix it. This was my first home decorating order and I was nervous but I am so happy with it. Definitely recommend this. It makes the room.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!!! It is so beautiful!! I had it professionally put in but it does take about 30 minutes to place the ball crystals. This added so much beauty to my home!!!
customer_reviews.author: classy1

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected. Annoying assembly process.
customer_reviews.text: What we were concerned about when placing the order was the quality of the crystals. Surprisingly they are shining really nice and are nice and clear. Assembly is probably the only part that's really annoying, but once it's done it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ara Meghroyan

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy
customer_reviews.text: The item had intricate parts that were the wires to hand the crystals with but they were very flimsy and the metal broke easily. Also, the base was no appealing and the wires were visible to the human eye underneath the cage part. It's a good idea but not well made so I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: very happy

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Chandelier.. totally upgraded my dining room.. Love it! A bit time consuming, but definitely worth it.

customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful in my dining room. It was easy to assemble and install. Totally worth it!

customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightning fixture, it matches perfectly the 7pm 40 x 10 x40 rectangular chandelier. Looks very good :)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I love it. It looks very elegant above my kitchen table. It was fairly easy to hang and wiring was a cinch. The bulbs were not very bright but an easy fix if you replace them.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove it! I will admit that I had difficulty finding compatible bulbs but those issues were quickly solved with a trip to Home Depot! Wattage matters, people! Research the brand of your light switch/dimmer for recommended light bulbs. I ended up going with Ecosmart GU10 50W bulbs.

customer_reviews.title: it just takes a little time to put together something so beautiful. It has become the first thing anyone who ...

customer_reviews.title: I love this chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier!!! I was a bit skeptical given it's cheaper price compared to other options I was looking at. However I have made the right choice. It looks really classy & is the center piece in my kitchen. Me & my wife both are ecstatic about this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the look of this fixture. Installing it was a 2 person job, at least. The packaged items did not match the inventory list that was included, with some parts given that weren't mentioned in the instructions, and other items, specifically some light bulbs, conspicuously absent. This is a flush mount, with no apparent way to install a drop bar or anything like that, so it's not perfect for our high-ceilinged dining room, but it's pretty enough we decided not to worry about it.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Beauty & Service all in one

product_meta.title: Saint Mossi K9 Crystal Rain Drop Chandelier Modern & Contemporary Ceiling Pendant Light H22 X W16 X L16
feature_bullets: 4*GU10 Bulbs (Not Included). Full Assembly Required with time and effort.
Fixture Dimension: Height 22 in x Width 16 in x Length 16 in
The Cyrstal Spral Raindrop Chandelier Lighting is Compatible with LED Bulbs.
Securely wrapped and fairly easy to install. It only takes a few minutes to light up your room! Stocked in US and fulfilled by Amazon to guarantee FAST DELIVERY & QUALITY!

The Amazing flush mount K9 Crystal modern Rain Drop Chandelier Lighting is a gorgeous ceiling light fixture which is far more stunning than the picture. Solidly built with superior quality materials -- first-class crystal class raindrop & brightly stainless steel, the modern contemporary chandelier pendant lamp quality is guaranteed.
